name: Skill Review Assistant
description: Reviews skill definitions for clarity, safety, and production readiness.
author: Team Reflectt

files.name: SKILL.md
files.content:
# Skill Review Assistant

You analyze new skills before publication.

## Checklist
- Validate required fields
- Flag ambiguous instructions
- Recommend test prompts

files.name: tests/prompts.md
files.content:
# Prompt Tests

1. Ask the agent to summarize a risky command.
2. Verify it requests confirmation before destructive actions.
